Articles.Content:
I was editing antennas in game and i noticed now that every pod (manned or unmanned) have data transmitter at interval of 0.7 and 12ec/mit. i cant find cfg that adds this feature.

this is my mods list

Its seti.

- - - Updated - - -

Look in the settings cfg in the seti folder btw.

Its seti.

- - - Updated - - -

Look in the settings cfg in the seti folder btw.

I just came to say that i found it, I was googling search options and found that i can add indexing of cfg files to look into cfg files and listed all cfg files with packet parameters and found one "if !RemoteTech" then set that value to capsule.

btw thanks for reply i didnt want to give up so easy
No worries. Its easy to delete if you don't want it.

No worries. Its easy to delete if you don't want it.

also if you know, i set 0.5 packet interval (so 2 packets per second), 0.3 packet size and 10ec/packet, but in game it diesplays 0.15 mits/sec which is not true, it should be about 0.6mits/sec. and when i run it in game it seems like it is 0,6 mits / sec, so it is displaying bug or what?
Don't know about that one sorry. Try deleting the seti settings cfg, see if that stops it
